attributes.action: The Royal Navy to Stop Illegal Boats: Immediate Deportation of Illegal Migrants
attributes.additional_details: To protect our sovereignty, national security, and public safety. Over £8 billion of taxpayers’ money has been spent on illegal migration while our own services are under strain. Britain is one of the highest-taxed countries in the world. We must prioritise our people, enforce the law, and stop rewarding illegal entry. Illegal migrants are not asylum seekers. Enough is enough — we demand urgent and decisive action.
attributes.background:
We demand the UK Government take immediate and decisive action to protect our borders from illegal Channel crossings.

The British people expect the Government to uphold the law and defend our sovereignty. We call for the Royal Navy to be deployed to in

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
